content.text:
# TimedText:OneRepublic - Apologize.ogg.en.srt

1
00:00:00,100 --> 00:00:05,200
You tell me that you're sorry, didn't think I'd turn around
2
00:00:05,200 --> 00:00:12,000
I say that it's too late to apologize
3
00:00:12,000 --> 00:00:15,200
It's too late
4
00:00:15,200 --> 00:00:20,200
I said, it's too late to apologize
